name: Wallflower
description: The Wallflower is a medium-sized plant creature with the ability to grapple foes using its tentacles and attack with its beak, blending offensive and defensive capabilities.
memorable: Excels in stealth and can manipulate enemy movement with its Luring Scent ability.
goals: To control battlefield movement and immobilize prey with grappling tactics.
relations: May be related to other plant creatures or serve as guardians in forested areas.
environment: Typically found in forested or overgrown areas.
strengths: Possesses good stealth capabilities and damage resistances to nonmagical weapons.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma limit its interaction and charm abilities.
attacks: Attacks with tentacles that deal bludgeoning damage and can grapple enemies. Uses a beak attack on grappled foes.
most_powerful_ability: Luring Scent can force enemies to move closer, controlling their position.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet and a passive perception of 12.
skills: Proficient in stealth, allowing it to remain hidden in its environment.
additional_information: Resistant to damage from nonmagical weapons.
Has an escape DC of 12 for grappling.
The Luring Scent affects beasts, humanoids, and fey.
Creatures that succeed on Luring Scent save become immune for 24 hours.
Can only attack grappled creatures with its beak.
test_queries: stealthy plant with special scent ability
medium plant monster that controls movement
creature with tentacles and beak attacks
